name: cw20-base
description: AssemblyScript implementation of basic CosmWasm counter contract
author: William Chen

scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --target debug --runtime stub --disable bulk-memory --sourceMap --exportStart --use abort=~lib/@cosmwasm-as/std/as/ABORT --debug
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/index.ts --target release --runtime stub --disable bulk-memory --sourceMap --exportStart --use abort=~lib/@cosmwasm-as/std/as/ABORT --debug
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
